document.title: Upper Arch Aligner Treatment Plan
document.summary: This is a straightforward case focused on aligning the upper teeth using clear aligners. The treatment is anticipated to take about 4 to 6 months, with progress monitored primarily remotely. No attachments are required for this case. Whitening is included as part of the treatment package.
key_points: Clear aligners for upper teeth alignment
next_steps: Schedule initial fitting for clear aligners
